reviews.review_msg: Do NOT take this class w Krebs. This is the first time he has taught it and 80% of students going into the final assignment have a low 60%. This class was NEVER previously based on coding and he made the whole thing about SAS. He gave all groups except ONE a 10.5/20 on our presentations- this is an upper level HSCI course need I remind you.

VERY confusing,concise assignment description only answer you can get from his email reply is to think about this yourself.Make easy assignment very confusing and frustrating.The grades are crazy,for 3/7 groups, group presentation marks are around 50%.Same for individual assignments,how can I write based on guessing what prof need us to say? AVOID!
